title: Ancient Peaks Winery Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, March 19, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a tasting with Ancient Peaks Winery, a family-owned estate from Paso Robles’ southernmost vineyard, Margarita Vineyard. Experience their bold, terroir-driven wines that showcase the richness of California’s Central Coast.

Tasting Fee: $20 (Refunded with the purchase of any bottle from the tasting!)

Featured Wines:

  • Ancient Peaks Renegade 2021 – 92 pts, Vinous & Wine Enthusiast – A bold blend of Syrah, Petit Verdot, and Malbec with wild berry, cocoa, and smoky spice.
  • Ancient Peaks Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – 90 pts, Tasting Panel & Wine Enthusiast – Deep and complex with layers of plum, cassis, and violet, finishing with fresh acidity and fine tannins.
  • Ancient Peaks Zinfandel 2021 – 93 pts, Wine Enthusiast & Tasting Panel – A vibrant and savory Zin with notes of cherry, mocha, pepper, and cedar.
  • Ancient Peaks Sauvignon Blanc 2023 – 90 pts, Vinous & Wine Enthusiast – Bright and refreshing with citrus, guava, and a crisp, fresh finish.

Don’t miss this opportunity to explore the flavors of Paso Robles and take home your favorite—buy a bottle and your tasting is free!
